A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really don't understand the negative reviews on this film. It seems that people just can't seem to move on from the first 3 films\, and turn their nose up at new concepts and ideas that are presented as the saga moves forward. From the acting and story\, to the set pieces and sound the film is great. I will admit it has a couple of \"random\" moments\, such as space Leia and the casino\, but as films go this it was a great \"sit back and enjoy\" film.
